title: AI-Powered Recommendation System
description: Built a machine learning recommendation engine using Python, TensorFlow, and collaborative filtering to personalize user experiences.

title: Django REST API Platform
description: Developed a scalable REST API platform with Django and DRF, featuring JWT authentication, rate limiting, and comprehensive test coverage.

title: Real-time Data Pipeline
description: Created an ETL pipeline processing millions of records daily using Apache Airflow, Python, and cloud infrastructure.
